channel.title: If you want a forum for your server come and cheak it out!
channel.description:
[b]Purpose[/b]: To get a forum for your server, or just to have fun in making one! ;D
[b]Difficulty[/b]: 1/10
[u][b]Procedure[/b][/u]:
[b]Step 1[/b]:
[i]Go to http://www.smfforfree2.com/free-forum.php[/i]
[b]Step 2[/b]:
[i]Complete the information for [u]Forum Settings[/u] and [u]Account Settings[/u][/i]
[b]Step 3[/b]:
[i]After you have completed the Fourm and Account Settings, you will find yourself in a forum. Now you should of remembered your username and pass. Log on and [b]EDIT IT![/b]![/i]
[b]Hint[/b]:
[i]You can find codes for your forum at [url=http://www.smfsupport.com/support !]http://www.smfsupport.com/support ![/url][/i]
Credits: 100% to me, only if someone actually posted something like this...
[b]**If this does not go in the right Category any mod please tell me. And tell me where to move this.**
Thanks.[/b] This is used the same as MoparScape's Forum.

item.title: If you want a forum for your server come and cheak it out!
item.dc:creator: @FEARSCAPE FEARSCAPE
item.description:
@FEARSCAPE wrote:

Purpose: To get a forum for your server, or just to have fun in making one! ;D

Difficulty: 1/10

Procedure:

Step 1:

Go to http://www.smfforfree2.com/free-forum.php

Step 2:

Complete the information for Forum Settings and Account Settings

Step 3:

After you have completed the Fourm and Account Settings, you will find yourself in a forum. Now you should of remembered your username and pass. Log on and EDIT IT!!

Hint:

You can find codes for your forum at http://www.smfsupport.com/support !

Credits: 100% to me, only if someone actually posted something like this…

[b]If this does not go in the right Category any mod please tell me. And tell me where to move this.

Thanks.[/b]
This is used the same as MoparScape’s Forum.

Read full topic
item.source: If you want a forum for your server come and cheak it out!
